title: When can I use free champs?
body: My Japanese account is level 10 and I still cannot use the free champions I looked this up and it says you need to be level 6 but im past that and it still hasnt unlocked the free champs.

replies.body: The japanese region is run by another support, so it may be different in that region.  Generally, at level 10 you will unlock access to the [free champion rotation](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/free-rotation).  The rotation will change each week, so the specific set of champions will only be free for a short period until changed.
